00022 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/MultiChannelCelFileCollater.h"

00024 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;

00027  * Default constructor
00028  */
00029 MultiChannelCelFileCollater::MultiChannelCelFileCollater()
00030 {
00031         wavelength = NO_WAVELENGTH;
00032 }

00037 MultiChannelCelFileCollater::~MultiChannelCelFileCollater()

00042 void MultiChannelCelFileCollater::OpenReader(const std::string& file, GenericData& data)
00043 {
00044         data.Clear();
00045         GenericFileReader reader;
00046         reader.SetFilename(file);
00047         reader.Open(data);
00048         reader.Close();
00049 }
00050 
00051 void MultiChannelCelFileCollater::Collate(const StringVector& celFiles, const std::string& outFile)
00052 {
00053         FileHeader outFileHdr;
00054         outFileHdr.SetFilename(outFile);
00055         CopyHeaders(celFiles, outFileHdr);
00056         GenericFileWriter writer(&outFileHdr);
00057         writer.WriteHeader();
00058         WriteDataGroups(celFiles, writer);
00059 }
00060 
00061 void MultiChannelCelFileCollater::CopyHeaders(const StringVector& celFiles, FileHeader& outFileHdr)
00062 {
00063         //read the first cel file header
00064         GenericData gReader;
00065         OpenReader(celFiles[0], gReader);
00066         CopyFileHdr(gReader.Header(), outFileHdr);
00067         DataGroupHeader dstGrp;
00068         CopyDataGroupHdr(gReader.Header().GetDataGroup(0), dstGrp);
00069         outFileHdr.AddDataGroupHdr(dstGrp);
00070         for(u_int32_t i = 1; i < celFiles.size(); i++)
00071         {
00072                 //read the remaining cel file headers
00073                 OpenReader(celFiles[i], gReader);
00074                 DataGroupHeader dstGrp;
00075                 UpdateWavelength(gReader.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
00076                 CopyDataGroupHdr(gReader.Header().GetDataGroup(0), dstGrp);
00077                 outFileHdr.AddDataGroupHdr(dstGrp);
00078         }
00079         gReader.Clear();
00080 }
00081 
00082 void MultiChannelCelFileCollater::UpdateWavelength(GenericDataHeader* hdr)
00083 {
00084         ParameterNameValueType p;
00085         if(hdr->FindNameValParam(AFFY_FILTER_WAVELENGTH, p))
00086         {
00087                 wavelength = p.GetValueText();
00088         }
00089         else
00090         {
00091                 wavelength = NO_WAVELENGTH;
00092         }
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 void MultiChannelCelFileCollater::WriteDataGroups(const StringVector& celFiles, GenericFileWriter& writer)
00097 {
00098 
00099         int dataGroupCnt = writer.GetDataGroupCnt();
00100         for(int i = 0; i < dataGroupCnt; i++)
00101         {
00102                 GenericFileReader reader;
00103                 GenericData data;
00104                 reader.SetFilename(celFiles[i]);
00105                 reader.Open(data);
00106                 DataGroupWriter grpWriter = writer.GetDataGroupWriter(i);
00107                 DataGroupReader dgReader = reader.GetDataGroupReader(0);
00108                 WriteDataGroup(dgReader, data.Header().GetDataGroup(0), grpWriter, i >= (dataGroupCnt - 1));
00109         }
00110 }
00111 
00112 void MultiChannelCelFileCollater::WriteDataGroup(DataGroupReader& grpReader, DataGroupHeader& grpHdr, DataGroupWriter& grpWriter, bool lastGroup)
00113 {
00114         grpWriter.WriteHeader();
00115         for(int i = 0; i < grpReader.GetDataSetCnt(); i++)
00116         {
00117           DataSetReader reader = grpReader.GetDataSetReader(i);
00118           WriteDataSet(reader, grpHdr.GetDataSet(i), grpWriter.GetDataSetWriter(i));
00119         }
00120 
00121         if (!lastGroup)
00122         {
00123                 grpWriter.UpdateNextDataGroupPos();
00124         }
00125 }
00126 
00127 void MultiChannelCelFileCollater::WriteDataSet(DataSetReader& setReader, DataSetHeader& setHdr, DataSetWriter& setWriter)
00128 {
00129         setWriter.WriteHeader();                
00130         int sz = setHdr.GetDataSize();
00131         char* buffer = new char[sz];
00132         int total = 0;
00133         while(total < sz)
00134         {
00135                 int count = setReader.ReadBuffer(buffer, sz);
00136                 setWriter.WriteBuffer(buffer, count);
00137                 total += count;
00138         }
00139         setWriter.UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00140 }
00141 
00142 void MultiChannelCelFileCollater::CopyFileHdr(FileHeader& src, FileHeader& dst)
00143 {
00144         CopyParentHeaders(src.GetGenericDataHdr(), dst.GetGenericDataHdr());
00145         CopyGenericHeader(src.GetGenericDataHdr(), dst.GetGenericDataHdr());
00146 }
00147 
00148 void MultiChannelCelFileCollater::CopyParentHeaders(GenericDataHeader* src, GenericDataHeader* dst)
00149 {
00150         GenDataHdrVectorIt begin, end;
00151         src->GetParentIterators(begin, end);
00152         while(begin != end)
00153         {
00154                 dst->AddParent(*begin);
00155                 begin++;
00156         }
00157 }
00158 
00159 void MultiChannelCelFileCollater::CopyGenericHeader(GenericDataHeader* src, GenericDataHeader* dst)
00160 {
00161         dst->SetFileTypeId(MULTI_CHANNEL_FILE_ID);
00162         CopyGenericHeaderParams(src, dst);
00163 }
00164 
00165 void MultiChannelCelFileCollater::CopyGenericHeaderParams(GenericDataHeader* src, GenericDataHeader* dst)
00166 {
00167         ParameterNameValueTypeIt begin, end;
00168         src->GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00169         while(begin != end)
00170         {
00171                 if(begin->GetName() == AFFY_FILTER_WAVELENGTH)
00172                 {
00173                         wavelength = begin->GetValueText();
00174                 }
00175                 else
00176                 {
00177                         dst->AddNameValParam(*begin);
00178                 }
00179                 begin++;
00180         }
00181 }
00182 
00183 void MultiChannelCelFileCollater::CopyDataGroupHdr(DataGroupHeader& src, DataGroupHeader& dst)
00184 {
00185         dst.SetName(wavelength);
00186         DataSetHdrIt begin, end;
00187         src.GetDataSetIterators(begin, end);
00188         while(begin != end)
00189         {
00190                 DataSetHeader dstSet;
00191                 CopyDataSetHdr(*begin, dstSet);
00192                 dst.AddDataSetHdr(dstSet);
00193                 begin++;
00194         }
00195 }
00196 
00197 void MultiChannelCelFileCollater::CopyDataSetHdr(DataSetHeader& src, DataSetHeader& dst)
00198 {
00199         dst.SetName(src.GetName());
00200         dst.SetRowCnt(src.GetRowCnt());
00201         for(int i = 0; i < src.GetColumnCnt(); i++)
00202         {
00203                 dst.AddColumn(src.GetColumnInfo(i));
00204         }
00205         ParameterNameValueTypeIt begin, end;
00206         src.GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00207         while(begin != end)
00208         {
00209                 dst.AddNameValParam(*begin);
00210                 begin++;
00211         }
00212 }
